page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT AND MEDIA
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR TYPE OF ENTERTAINMENT IN OUR SURVEY WAS T.V. 53% OF PEOPLE STATING IT WAS THEIR MOST ENJOYABLE WAY OF SPENDING LEISURE TIME. 19% OF THOSE SURVEYED PREFERRED GOING TO THE THEATRE. THERE IS NO PROFESSIONAL COMPANY IN HERNE BAY BUT CANTERBURY, 7 MILES AWAY, HAS A LOCAL AUTHORITY THEATRE WHICH ATTRACTS PROFESSIONAL TOURING COMPANIES. THERE ARE SEVERAL AMATEUR THEATRE AND OPERATIC GROUPS IN HERNE BAY. SEVERAL PEOPLE SURVEYED CONSIDERED TAKING PART IN AMATEUR DRAMATICS. 5% INTERVIEWED ENJOYED THE CINEMA WHILST 14% PREFERED HIRING HOME VIDEO FILMS. HERNE BAY HAS ONE CINEMA AND SEVERAL LOCAL PAPERS. OTHER LEISURE ACTIVITIES AS A SOURCE OF ENTERTAINMENT INCLUDE - ADULT STUDIES, TAKEN AT THE LOCAL SECONDARY SCHOOL, PAINTING, DANCING, SEWING, PHOTOGRAPHY AND GARDENING.
